## Introduction
This study analyses the output data from the initial survey conducted at the begginin of the course Exploratory Data Analysis and Visualization in Columbia University. We understand that its proupose is to allow us to do a hands-on work with new visualization tools introduced. Along the study, we will try to present with an original visualization part of the answer of some question about the data.
